original.question: Are both Ride a Wild Pony and Frozen 2 computer-animated films?
original.context: Frozen 2 is an upcoming American computer-animated film produced by Walt Disney Animation Studios and will be released by Walt Disney Pictures. It is a sequel to the 2013 film, "Frozen". Ride a Wild Pony is a 1975 American-Australian family adventure film produced by Walt Disney Productions, directed by Don Chaffey and based on the novel "A Sporting Proposition" by James Aldridge.
